thai: sà-wàt-dii khâ. baaw-rí-sàt nam tuua thai-laaend. yin-dii ráp-chái khâ.
english: Hello. This is Nam Tour Thailand. May I help you?

thai: sà-wàt-dii khráp. phǒm yàak jaawng rót-dtûu. bpai nǎawng-khaai nâ khráp.
english: Hello. I want to reserve a van. I'm going to Nong Khai.

thai: dâai khâ. mâi sâap wâa jà châo tháng-mòt gìi wan. láe jà àawk dooen-thaang mûuea-rài khá.
english: Sure. I don't know that you will rent total how many days? And will go out traveling when?

thai: phǒm yàak bpai duu ngaan bâng-fai phá-yaa nâak. jàak-nán gâaw jà bpai thîiao laao looei.
english: I want to go see the fireworks event, Naga Fireballs festival. After that, I'm going on a trip to Laos.

thai: thâa-yàang-nán dì-chǎn khǎaw-náe-nam bproo-graaem tuua nǎawng-khaai wiiang-jan lǔuang-phrá-baang ná khá. thaang baaw-rí-sàt jà jaawng thîi-phák phráawm aa-hǎan-cháao hâi dtà-làawt gaan-dooen-thaang looei khâ.
english: In that case, may I recommend a tour program of Nong Khai, Vientienne, and Luang Prabang? Our company will book accommodations, together with breakfast, for throughout to travel.

thai: khun jaawng dtó wái rǔue yang khá
english: Did you have a table reserved yet?
